Using Menu Item in Listbox
Menu Item is a part of the Listbox component for web and is
Netherlands automatically available for selection patterns. Menu Item is also
available as a standalone component for iOS and Android.

Menu Item is a standalone component for native mobile. It can
Select a room category X be used for selection in Sheets and List View Item.
